Package de.elo.ix.jscript.handler

Interface IConvertHandler

public interface IConvertHandler
Internally used interface. Class Convert forwards method calls to an implementation of this interface. The implementation is only available when we are running as a IX event script or plugin.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String fromInternalDate​(java.lang.Number date)
    Convert a date value from the internal date format into the ISO format.
    java.lang.String fromInternalDate​(java.lang.Number date, java.lang.String timeZone)
    Convert a date value from the internal date format into the ISO format.
    java.lang.Number fromInternalNumber​(java.lang.String v)
    Convert an index field value in internal format into a Number object.
    java.lang.Number toInternalDate​(java.lang.String isoDate)
    Convert an ISO date in the local time zone into the internal date format.
    java.lang.Number toInternalDate​(java.lang.String isoDate, java.lang.String timeZone)
    Convert an ISO date into the internal date format.
    java.lang.String toInternalNumber​(java.lang.Number v, int dmlType, int max)
    This function converts a numeric value into the String format that is internally used for index field values.
    java.lang.String toInternalNumber​(java.lang.Number v, java.lang.String okeyName)
    This function converts a numeric value into the String format that is internally used for index field values.

  • Method Details

    • toInternalNumber

      java.lang.String toInternalNumber​(java.lang.Number v, java.lang.String okeyName)
      This function converts a numeric value into the String format that is internally used for index field values.
      Parameters:
      v - Numeric value, e.g. -5.11
      okeyName - Group name of an index field. A DocMaskLine object must be found with DocMaskLine.key = okeyName.
      Returns:
      Internal string representation used in the database table objkeys in the column okeydata, e.g. @@@5.11

    • toInternalNumber

      java.lang.String toInternalNumber​(java.lang.Number v, int dmlType, int max)
      This function converts a numeric value into the String format that is internally used for index field values.
      Parameters:
      v - Numeric value
      dmlType - One of the DocMaskLineC.TYPE_NUMERIC* constants. This value corresponds to DocMaskLine.type.
      max - Maximum number of characters (including the decimal separator). This value corresponds to DocMaskLine.max.
      Returns:
      Internal string representation used in the database table objkeys in the column okeydata.
      Throws:
      IXException

    • fromInternalNumber

      java.lang.Number fromInternalNumber​(java.lang.String v)
      Convert an index field value in internal format into a Number object.
      Parameters:
      v - Internal string representation of a numeric value, e.g. "@@@5.11" for -5.11
      Returns:
      Number object.

    • toInternalDate

      java.lang.Number toInternalDate​(java.lang.String isoDate, java.lang.String timeZone)
      Convert an ISO date into the internal date format.
      Parameters:
      isoDate - ISO date
      timeZone - isoDate is assumed to be in this time zone.
      Returns:
      Internal date format - always in the local time zone.

    • toInternalDate

      java.lang.Number toInternalDate​(java.lang.String isoDate)
      Convert an ISO date in the local time zone into the internal date format.
      Parameters:
      isoDate - ISO date in the local time zone.
      Returns:
      Internal date format - always in the time zone of the server.

    • fromInternalDate

      java.lang.String fromInternalDate​(java.lang.Number date, java.lang.String timeZone)
      Convert a date value from the internal date format into the ISO format.
      Parameters:
      date - Internal date format - always in the local time zone.
      timeZone - The returned ISO value is based on this time zone.
      Returns:
      ISO format.

    • fromInternalDate

      java.lang.String fromInternalDate​(java.lang.Number date)
      Convert a date value from the internal date format into the ISO format.
      Parameters:
      date - Internal date format - always in the local time zone.
      Returns:
      Date value in ISO format based on the local time zone.
